com.braintreegateway
Class CustomerGateway

java.lang.Object
  com.braintreegateway.CustomerGateway

public class CustomerGateway
extends java.lang.Object

Provides methods to create, delete, find, and update Customer objects. This class does not need to be instantiated directly. Instead, use BraintreeGateway.customer() to get an instance of this class: 

 BraintreeGateway gateway = new BraintreeGateway(...);
 gateway.customer().create(...)
